attributes.action: End the poisoning of our youth via the fluoridisation of our drinking water.
attributes.background:
Fluoride is a well known neurotoxin.
Fluoride is considered hazardous waste by the environmental protection agency.
Our future generations deserve better than to be systematically poisoned.
The anti fluoride movement is supported by many well known doctors, dentist and Neuro scientists.

rejection.details:
If you are asking the Government to take steps to end all schemes which increase the levels of fluoride in drinking water in the UK, you could start a petition asking for that. 

We cannot find a source for your statement that the Environmental Protection Agency in the USA considers fluoride to be hazardous waste. The EPA has set limits for fluoride in water:

http://water.epa.gov/drink/contaminants/basicinformation/fluoride.cfm

You may find this information from Public Health England about fluoride in water in the UK helpful:

https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/water-fluoridation-health-monitoring-report-for-england-2014
